result.name: north-sea-plaice-and-lemon-sole-2004-05-fisheries-science-partnership
result.notes:
Three surveys of plaice and lemon sole on the fishing grounds off the NE coast 
of England and east coast of Scotland, using commercial twin-rig Scraper 
trawls. To examine the catch composition in this fishery, particularly the 
bycatch of cod. To compare the catches between 100mm and 120mm mesh cod-ends, 
especially in relation to the retention of lemon soles, and to compare the 
catches between various combinations of cod-end mesh and square-mesh-panels.
